dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT sh.insert_date sortone, sh.shipment_gid || 'A' sorter, sh.shipment_xid shipment_id, (CASE WHEN sh.transport_mode_gid = 'TL' OR sh.transport_mode_gid = 'LTL' THEN (SELECT refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%TRUCK ID%' AND ROWNUM = 1) WHEN sh.transport_mode_gid = 'RAIL' THEN (SELECT refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%RAIL CAR ID%' AND ROWNUM = 1) WHEN sh.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' THEN (SELECT refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%CONTAINER ID%' AND ROWNUM = 1) END) tran_id, sh.shipment_type_gid shipment_type, 'FT' charge_type, glog_util.remove_domain(sh.original_shipment_gid) primary_shipment, (CASE WHEN (SELECT SUM(ssunit.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssunit ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssunit.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND ssd.activity = 'P') = 0 THEN '0.00' ELSE TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(sh.total_actual_cost_base * (ssu.unit_net_weight_base / ROUND((SELECT SUM(ssunit.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssunit ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssunit.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND ssd.activity = 'P'),2)),2),'999,999,990.00')) END) actual_cost, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base,2),'999,999,990.00')) actual_weight, (SELECT refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'COMMODITY ID' AND ROWNUM = 1) commodity, (SELECT loc.city FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc on orel.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid WHERE ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) dest_city, (SELECT loc.location_name FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc on orel.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid WHERE ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) dest_name, (SELECT loc.province_code FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc on orel.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid WHERE ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) dest_state, (TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(sh.insert_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY')) insert_date, (SELECT oref.order_release_refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN order_release_refnum oref on orel.order_release_gid = oref.order_release_gid AND oref.order_release_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' WHERE ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) loc_cd, sh.transport_mode_gid trans_mode, (SELECT loc.city FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc on orel.source_location_gid = loc.location_gid WHERE ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) origin_city, (SELECT loc.location_name FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc on orel.source_location_gid = loc.location_gid WHERE ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) origin_name, (SELECT loc.province_code FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul INNER JOIN order_release orel ON ssul.order_release_gid = orel.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc on orel.source_location_gid = loc.location_gid WHERE ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) origin_state, REPLACE(sh.insert_user,'SCOULAR/FOOD.','') planner, con2.contact_xid servprov, (SELECT ssurem.remark_text FROM s_ship_unit_remark ssurem WHERE ssurem.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssurem.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.TRAN ID DATE' AND ROWNUM = 1) ship_date FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON sh.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.activity = 'P' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con1 ON sh.insert_user = con1.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con2 ON sh.servprov_gid = con2.contact_gid WHERE sh.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND sh.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(sh.insert_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY'),'MM/DD/YY') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(sh.insert_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY'),'MM/DD/YY') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT ss.status_value_gid FROM shipment_status ss WHERE ss.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.SHIPMENT_CANCELLED' AND ss.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.SHIPMENT_CANCELLED_YES' AND ss.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid) UNION SELECT s.insert_date sortone, sh.original_shipment_gid || 'B' sorter, sh.shipment_xid shipment_id, '' tran_id, sh.shipment_type_gid shipment_type, sref3.shipment_refnum_value charge_type, glog_util.remove_domain(sh.original_shipment_gid) primary_shipment, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(sh.total_actual_cost_base,2),'999,999,990.00')) actual_cost, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND((SELECT SUM(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND ssd.activity = 'P'),2),'999,999,990.00')) actual_weight, sref1.shipment_refnum_value commodity, loc1.city dest_city, loc1.location_name dest_name, loc1.province_code dest_state, (TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(sh.insert_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY')) insert_date, sref2.shipment_refnum_value loc_cd, sh.transport_mode_gid trans_mode, loc2.city origin_city, loc2.location_name origin_name, loc2.province_code origin_state, REPLACE(sh.insert_user,'SCOULAR/FOOD.','') planner, con2.contact_xid servprov, 'NA' ship_date FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment sh ON s.shipment_gid = sh.original_shipment_gid AND sh.shipment_type_gid = 'SECONDARY CHARGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON sh.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON sh.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON sh.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARGE TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON sh.dest_location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON sh.source_location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con1 ON sh.insert_user = con1.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con2 ON sh.servprov_gid = con2.contact_gid WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(s.insert_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY'),'MM/DD/YY') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(s.insert_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY'),'MM/DD/YY') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT ss.status_value_gid FROM shipment_status ss WHERE ss.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.SHIPMENT_CANCELLED' AND ss.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.SHIPMENT_CANCELLED_YES' AND ss.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT ss.status_value_gid FROM shipment_status ss WHERE ss.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.SHIPMENT_CANCELLED' AND ss.status_value_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.SHIPMENT_CANCELLED_YES' AND ss.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid) ORDER BY sortone DESC, sorter
